statements: DELETE FROM audit_log WHERE username = 'admin' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM audit_log WHERE username = 'admin' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM Security_Threats WHERE threat_level = 'High' AND threat_id = 10;
DELETE FROM user_access_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND action = 'LOGIN';
DELETE FROM audit_log WHERE user_id = 10 AND ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND success = false;
